name: opencode-context
description: Smart file finder for codebases with semantic search and relevance scoring

tools.name: find_files
tools.description: Find relevant files in the codebase based on a semantic search query. Use this to locate files related to a task before reading them. Returns ranked results with relevance scores.
whenToUse: User asks to find, locate, or search for files
Before reading multiple files to understand a codebase
Looking for specific functionality (auth, database, config, etc.)
User mentions 'where is X defined' or 'find Y'

query.description: Search query describing what to find (e.g., 'auth middleware', 'user model')

maxFiles.description: Maximum number of files to return

minScore.description: Minimum relevance score (0-100). Lower = more results

bestPractices: Call this BEFORE reading files when user asks to find something
Use maxFiles=10+ when doing initial codebase exploration
Set includeTests=true only when user specifically asks about tests
If no results, try lowering minScore to 5 or using broader terms
Results include relevance scores - files above 50 are highly relevant
scoringFactors: File type (tests ranked lower unless requested)
